DOC.brief_summary: The Biobank include data biological specimen woman three original study : 1 ) First-trimester Prediction Preeclampsia ( PREDICTION Study , NCT02189148 ) , 2 ) Pre-Eclampsia And growth Retardation , evaluative Longitudinal study ( PEARL Study , NCT02379832 ) , 3 ) Effect Low Dose Aspirin Birthweight Twins : The GAP Trial ( NCT02280031 ) 4 ) PREDICTION2 : Prediction Preeclampsia Pregnancy Complications Following Combined Iterative Screening .
DOC.brief_title: Biobank Prematurity , Preeclampsia Other Pregnancy Complications
DOC.detailed_description: This Biobank comprise : 1 ) medical , social , obstetrical ultrasonographic data , 2 ) human biological sample ( maternal plasma , serum buffy coat , maternal urine , cord blood ) 3 ) result derive ( biochemical ultrasonographic marker , genetics , risk calculation ... )
